_meta.source: Researched from TAT Thailand, TripAdvisor, and local guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers Laem Chabang port and greater Bangkok area

transit_routes.name: Laem Chabang to Bangkok
transit_routes.note: Port is 90km from Bangkok. Ship excursions most convenient. Traffic can be severe.

transit_routes.name: BTS Skytrain
transit_routes.note: Air-conditioned elevated train. Get Rabbit card for easy payment. Avoids traffic.

featured_experiences.name: Grand Palace & Temples
featured_experiences.note: Dress code enforced (shoulders and knees covered). Go early to beat crowds and heat.

featured_experiences.name: Floating Market Visit
featured_experiences.note: Very early start (leave Bangkok 5am) for authentic experience before tourist rush.

featured_experiences.name: Rooftop Bar Sunset
featured_experiences.note: Smart dress code. Arrive before sunset for best experience. Drinks expensive but views priceless.
